channel.title: Michaels Midweek Madness
channel.description: Talking about the basic facts of the digital era and living the life of a student

item.title: Welcome to Finland 3: Breaking the Stereotypes
item.description: Here I am attempting to break any stereotypes you might have about us Finns. Or then I failed miserably and made them stronger than ever... You decide.

item.title: Welcome to Finland part 2: how to healthcare
item.description: I got myself treated by a profesional and got the antibiotics for just under 20â‚¬. Is this something that will drive Finland into bankcruptcy or should the world take example? Click to see...

item.title: Welcome to Finland: Student's view of the education system
item.description: Everybody knows about Finland's world famous education system and PISA results, but how does an ordinary student see them?

item.title: Data security 101, how to keep your information safe
item.description: After the world heard from Snowden that USA gathers every single piece of data that goes through the States there was a lot of angry people. Is there really anything to be annoyed about?

item.title: Welcome to the Internet
item.description: Is the internet really that scary of a place? Can you really find harmful things there? Well the answer is yes and no, click to find out more...
